docs.lead_paragraph: WHEN Clark Clifford walked away from his multimillion-dollar law practice in the capital and entered the $35,000-a-year office of Secretary of Defense, he drew attention once more to that special breed within a breed, the Washington lawyer.

headline.main: A Fifth Estate -- Washington Lawyers; Washington lawyers (cont.)

docs.abstract: R Goldfarb article on typical Washington (DC) lawyers describes their special talents and expertise; discusses great influence they exercise over pub affairs; illus
docs.snippet: WHEN Clark Clifford walked away from his multimillion-dollar law practice in the capital and entered the $35,000-a-year office of Secretary of Defense, he drew attention once more to that special breed within a breed, the Washington lawyer.
